r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $995.2K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Rtg Protech. The average
  contract duration was 0.91 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $56.9K. The longest
  contract was 3.38 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $1.0M.
lookup_name: 'RTG PROTECH'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '995.2K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '69'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '12'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '17%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '67%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.25'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '372.0K'
s424_mean_duration: '0.91'
s421_mean_contract_value: '56.9K'
s425_max_duration: '3.38'
s422_max_contract_value: '1.0M'
